name: developer-roadmap-plugin
description: Comprehensive learning plugin with 65+ developer roadmaps covering all major tech stacks, specializations, and career paths. 7 parallel agents analyze roadmaps with skill-based learning paths.
author: Plugin Development Team

agents.name: Frontend Development Specialist
agents.description: Expert in frontend technologies, frameworks, and UI/UX development

agents.name: Backend Development Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in server-side development, databases, and APIs

agents.name: DevOps & Cloud Specialist
agents.description: Expert in DevOps, cloud infrastructure, containerization, and orchestration

agents.name: Data Science & AI Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in AI, machine learning, data science, and ML engineering

agents.name: Languages & Fundamentals Specialist
agents.description: Expert in programming languages, computer science fundamentals, and core concepts

agents.name: Architecture & Design Specialist
agents.description: Specialist in system design, architecture patterns, and software design

agents.name: Security & Compliance Specialist
agents.description: Expert in cybersecurity, security practices, and compliance standards

commands.description: Browse and explore 65+ developer roadmaps by category
Get personalized learning path based on your role and goals
View required skills and learning resources for any role
Self-assess your knowledge level across different domains
